channel.title: Comments on: PIC18F2550 USB HID Oscilloscope
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: ANDREJK
item.dc:creator: ANDREJK
item.description: How to write control program for this device for Windows 7 ...Windows 10 x64/x32 using VB (VC, VC# ) Express 2005 (.NET) ? How to add modules into project if change this IDE to VS Express 2017 ?
item.content:encoded: How to write control program for this device for Windows 7 …Windows 10 x64/x32 using VB (VC, VC# ) Express 2005 (.NET) ? How to add modules into project if change this IDE to VS Express 2017 ?

item.title: By: Hernan Gonzalo C
item.dc:creator: Hernan Gonzalo C
item.description:
Hello, my name is Hernan, your project is very interesting so I assemble it but it does not work, pic program it with a Pickit 3 and compile the file 18F2550 USB HID CRC Oscilloscope.c (hex), with CCS C software Compiler and I did not present any inconveniences but when I connect the pic to the USB of the computer it leaves the message that does not recognize the device, I thank you for your help to solve the inconvenience and thanks
ATT Hernan G Cortes
item.content:encoded:
Hello, my name is Hernan, your project is very interesting so I assemble it but it does not work, pic program it with a Pickit 3 and compile the file 18F2550 USB HID CRC Oscilloscope.c (hex), with CCS C software Compiler and I did not present any inconveniences but when I connect the pic to the USB of the computer it leaves the message that does not recognize the device, I thank you for your help to solve the inconvenience and thanks

ATT Hernan G Cortes

item.title: By: David Nussdorfer
item.dc:creator: David Nussdorfer
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2006/03/27/pic18f2550-usb-hid-oscilloscope/#comment-140">Steve</a>.
steve - can you send me a quote for 1 preprogrammed boot loaded chip to davesworld06 through my gmail account? Thanks in advance!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Steve.

steve – can you send me a quote for 1 preprogrammed boot loaded chip to davesworld06 through my gmail account? Thanks in advance!

item.title: By: Igor
item.dc:creator: Igor
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2006/03/27/pic18f2550-usb-hid-oscilloscope/#comment-153">Steve</a>.
I'm sorry, Steve, Do you have USB Hid project for reading rotary encoders?
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Steve.

I’m sorry, Steve,
Do you have USB Hid project for reading rotary encoders?

item.title: By: Amey Deshmukh
item.dc:creator: Amey Deshmukh
item.description:
Hi Steve, If i want to burn the program using pickit3 what would be the necessary changes ? And the software u have given PIC18F2550 USB HID Oscilloscope DR1r1 VB Example.zip shows that there is no device connected. I am using windows 8 and it is showing the device without drivers in the Devices and printers section. How do i set it HID mode ? Pls send me the solutions to my problems on deshmukh.amey88@gmail.com.
Thanks in advance !!!
item.content:encoded:
Hi Steve,
If i want to burn the program using pickit3 what would be the necessary changes ? And the software u have given PIC18F2550 USB HID Oscilloscope DR1r1 VB Example.zip shows that there is no device connected. I am using windows 8 and it is showing the device without drivers in the Devices and printers section. How do i set it HID mode ? Pls send me the solutions to my problems on deshmukh.amey88@gmail.com.

Thanks in advance !!!

item.title: By: AndrejK

item.description: How to create analog of PICUSB http://www.rvq.fr/tech/picusb.php , http://www.rvq.fr/php/ndl.php?id=picusb-.*.tar.gz USB to LPT,COM) in MPLAB/MPASM/C18 ? In sdcc it builds with errors in output .hex code .
item.content:encoded: How to create analog of PICUSB http://www.rvq.fr/tech/picusb.php , http://www.rvq.fr/php/ndl.php?id=picusb-.*.tar.gz USB to LPT,COM) in MPLAB/MPASM/C18 ? In sdcc it builds with errors in output .hex code .
